MORTGAGE AGREEMENT

This Agreement is made this 5th day of March, 2025, by and between:

Borrower: Jonathan D. Andrews
Address: 123 Elm St, Oakwood, TX 75001
Lender: Crestwood Bank
Address: 456 Crestview Ave, Oakwood, TX 75002

Loan Amount: $200,000
Interest Rate: 4.25%
Term: 30 years

The Borrower agrees to repay the loan amount in equal monthly installments for the entire term of the loan.

Signed by Borrower: ____________________
Signed by Lender: _____________________
